summary: makes both auriel's bow and shield better
descriptionHtml:
This mod makes the following changes to auriels bow and shield

auriel's bow

base damage 13 to 20
doubles the enchantment damage
infinite charge

sun damage 10 to 20
sun damage undead 20 to 40
explosion damage 10 to 20
explosion damage undead 10 to 20

so the total damage to normal target with the set arrow equipped is changed to 10+10 to 20+20 and against undead is 10+20+10+10 to 20+40+20+20


auriel's shield

added spellbreaker's ward effect to it
magnitude is the same as greater ward: 80
author: icefaii
